parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>arguments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if vehicle headlights are on otherwise [[false]].  
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.94 it is possible to get the status of a search light on a turret (see alt syntax).</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[isLightOn]] vehicle </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle with headlights </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[isLightOn]] [vehicle, turret] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle with search light on a turret </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> turret: [[Array]] - turret path </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_headlightsOn = [[isLightOn]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_pilotLightOn = [[isLightOn]] heli;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_searchLightOn = [[isLightOn]] [heli, [0]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setPilotLight]], [[isCollisionLightOn]], [[setCollisionLight]], [[isIRLaserOn]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
